title: Commutative Property of Addition
text: The equation can be re-arranged in the form $$2mn+3mn-5m+n$$
speech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form  2 m n, plus 3 m n, minus 5 m plus n
pacedSpeech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form   2 m n, plus 3 m n, minus 5 m plus n

title: Like Terms
text: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.
speech: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.
pacedSpeech: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.

title: Like Terms
speech: 2 m n, plus 3 m n is equal to, 5 m n
pacedSpeech: 2 m n, plus 3 m n is equal to, 5 m n
